short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protect your thoughts from Twitch THOTs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With over 1500 lewd twitch user targeted. THOT Protector is an extension to make Twitch a little more family friendly. We all know it is being taken over by people who are physically lewd on stream. THOT Protector will hide such parties. We are not picky about gender, just the content. THOT Protector will not steal your personal browsing data either.
